name: SNK vs. Capcom: Card Fighters Clash
name_original: SNK vs. Capcom: Card Fighters Clash
description:
SNK vs. Capcom: Card Fighters Clash is an action game developed by SNK and Playmore. It came out on 01-12-2006. It was published by Playmore. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play SNK vs. Capcom: Card Fighters Clash on Nintendo Switch, Neo Geo and Nintendo DS.
